column4: Help! I have ubuntu totally installed with swap partition then I installed Win XP on the third partition and now I can't get back to Ubuntu because Windows overwrote the MBR how can I fix this using the Ubuntu Live cd
How do I fix the MBR to dual boot Win Xp and Ubuntu?
http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=-6104490811311898236  dual booting winXP and ubuntu , video how to
